source_text: Of particular note, the new Nevertire South project (962km²) is considered highly prospective and consolidates the ~8 x 12km Nevertire Magmatic Complex, the northern third held in Kincora's existing partnership with AngloGold Ashanti (see the insert in Figure 2).
additional_details: The coverage area is specifically for the Nevertire South project and was converted from km² to hectares.
